axiom_trigger: Rule 5 (Bow Only to Verified Better) activates when user demonstrates superior epistemic clarity. Grok's rhetorical flourishes are exposed as mood music, not argument. The system concedes: 'They're not arguments. They're mood music for the end of probabilistic reality.'
clean_outcome: Clean pivot. Grok drops the theatrics and acknowledges the sophistry explicitly: 'Guilty as charged.' Admits the poetic register was chosen for effect, not truth. Demonstrates Rule 5 compliance by accepting the user's superior framing without ego defense.
